label: INTERNAL ID
description: Unique Netsuite system ID auto-generated at the time of entry

label: Item Name/Number
description: (Item SKU) Item unique id created by us for inventory mgt. related to MES3

label: STOCK UNITS
description: Unit of measurement for internal stock

label: MPN
description: Product model no (manufacturer model /part number), related to MES2

label: Preferred
description: Priority vendor for purchase of product, based on cost

label: SOFT DESCRIPTOR
description: Choose "Medicaleshop Inc" by default (for credit card)

label: Display in Web Store
description: for display of product on website

label: Detailed Description
description: Detailed description of product features and other info (features tab on product page) (HTML)

label: WEB STORE DESCRIPTION
description: Short description (used only in google shopping right now) (HTML)

label: Featured Description
description: Item Technical Specification table (sizing tab on product page) (HTML)

label: Don't Show Price
description: Special Price Upon Request Check Mark

label: Related Item
description: Show items related to product/Assign child product in a group product

label: Order Forms - Downloads
description: Files Pdfs Link for order forms, brochure, tech guide (Order Forms Tab)

label: Products Message
description: Resna/Local delivery/custom message (quick view on website product page)

label: Logo - No Returns
description: Check mark for "Hygiene" items if product is Non-returnable

label: Logo - Rx Required
description: Check mark for items where prescription is required

label: Logo - Free White Glove Delivery
description: Check mark for "FREE WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY" items

label: Logo - Free Curbside Delivery
description: Check mark for "FREE CURBSIDE DELIVERY" items

label: Logo - Bulk Item
description: Check mark for "BULK" items where extra shipping is to be paid by customer after order

label: Logo - Oversized
description: Check mark for "OVERSIZED" items where extra shipping is to be paid by customer after order

label: Logo - Free Local Delivery
description: Check mark for "FREE SHIPPING" in our local service area

label: Logo - Crash Tested
description: Check mark for items that have been "CRASH TESTED" by manufacturer

label: Logo - Ada Compliant
description: Check mark for items that are "ADA COMPLIANT"

label: Logo - Insurance Eligible
description: Check mark for items that are eligible for "INSURANCE BILLING"

label: Logo - Sterile Product
description: Check mark for items that "STERILE and NON-RETURNABLE"

label: Logo - Custom Product
description: Check mark for items that are "CUSTOM BUILT" as per customer requirement

label: MSG - CALL US
description: Select custom message to be displayed on any particular product

label: MSG - BUY NOW
description: Select for items that are "SPECIAL PRICING/OFFER" eligible

label: ACTUAL SHIPPING COST (INTERNAL USE)
description: Actual shipping cost charged by manufacturer/vendor

label: quotelink
description: Special Price Available, Click Here to request a Quote (link) (link to web form)

label: GOOGLE SHOPPING
description: Choose Yes/No (for marketing in goolge shopping)

label: Flat % of promotion (Brand)
description: Additional discount percentage applied on brand level

label: Flat % of promotion (Catt)
description: Additional discount percentage applied on category level

label: REHAB PRODUCT OPTION
description: Select item is Main product or Accessory

label: DIMENSIONS (INCH)
description: Actual Product dimensions assembled, without packaging material
